title: User Authentication and Multi-Factor Login
summary: Implement secure user login with multi-factor authentication for the banking portal.
description: Develop a secure login system that supports multi-factor authentication (MFA) to ensure only authorized users can access the banking portal. This includes integration with OTP through SMS/email and potential app-based authenticators. Implement session management, password recovery features, and account lockout mechanisms for multiple failed attempts. The authentication service should comply with financial industry security standards and integrate with the bank’s identity management system.

title: User Dashboard and Personalization
summary: Develop a personalized user dashboard displaying relevant banking products and account information.
description: Design and implement a dynamic user dashboard that presents personalized information such as account balances, available products, and relevant notifications. The dashboard should utilize user profile data and eligibility criteria to show tailored services. It should be visually appealing and organized, providing quick access to the most frequently used features while maintaining data privacy controls.

title: Responsive UI/UX Design
summary: Ensure the portal is responsive and consistent across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
description: Implement a responsive front-end design using modern web frameworks to provide a seamless user experience across devices. The portal layout and UI components should automatically adjust to suit different screen sizes without loss of functionality. This includes accessibility compliance, ensuring the design meets standards like WCAG for inclusive banking experiences.

title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Enable customers to open new accounts and modify services through automated workflows.
description: Design and implement streamlined workflows allowing customers to initiate account opening requests, product upgrades, or service modifications online. Processes should minimize the number of clicks and steps required while maintaining compliance with KYC and regulatory requirements. Automated routing and approval mechanisms should be built-in, with back-office integration for approval and follow-up actions.

title: Document Upload and Application Save/Resume Feature
summary: Implement document upload functionality and the ability to save incomplete applications.
description: Allow users to upload necessary documentation directly through the portal as part of workflows such as account opening or service requests. Enable users to save incomplete applications and resume later from any device. Implement file encryption, format validation, and secure storage handling to ensure sensitive document integrity and compliance with data protection policies.

title: Real-Time Request Tracking and Notifications
summary: Provide real-time status updates and notifications for submitted requests.
description: Develop a system to track and display real-time status updates for user requests, such as account opening or service modifications. Integrate automated email and SMS notifications to inform customers about status changes, approvals, or additional required actions. Include a historical view of all submitted requests for transparency and self-service convenience.

title: Interaction History and Audit Logging
summary: Maintain a detailed record of all user interactions and actions within the portal.
description: Build a robust logging and audit trail system to maintain a complete history of customer interactions and transactions within the portal. This includes login activities, service requests, document submissions, and data changes. Ensure that audit data is tamper-proof, easily retrievable for compliance reviews, and stored securely in alignment with the bank’s data retention policy.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the core banking system for real-time data exchange.
description: Establish secure and efficient integration between the portal and the bank’s core banking system to enable real-time retrieval and update of account data, product offerings, and customer details. Use APIs or middleware services to maintain system decoupling and prevent performance bottlenecks. Ensure data synchronization and transactional consistency while maintaining strict access controls and monitoring mechanisms.

title: Role-Based Access Control Implementation
summary: Configure and enforce role-based access controls for the portal.
description: Implement a role-based access control (RBAC) mechanism ensuring that users can only view and perform actions appropriate to their profile and authorization level. Define roles such as retail customers, business customers, and internal support staff, along with their access privileges. Integrate RBAC with the authentication system and ensure it extends across the portal's modules and APIs for consistent enforcement.

title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Develop and optimize a standalone database for the portal, separate from core banking systems.
description: Design and implement a dedicated database for the portal to enhance performance and reliability. The database should manage user session data, workflow states, and interaction logs without impacting the main banking system. Implement indexing, caching, and query optimization strategies to ensure fast response times. Regular backups, encryption, and redundancy mechanisms should be included to guarantee system resilience and data integrity.
